mapper.select: select t1.parentItemCode itemCode,t1.parentItemName itemName,sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0)) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, parent.id as parentItemCode, parent.item_name as parentItemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb, hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo parent where hcb.parent_item_code = parent.id and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(Inp_ops_count) cnt from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital where t2.cnt>0 group by t1.parentItemName order by t1.seqNo

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.parent_item_code = #{parentId} and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(Inp_ops_count) cnt from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.hospital in (select id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where parent_item_code = #{parentId} and id in and length(item_code)=10) and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital where t2.cnt>0 order by t1.seqNo

select hsp.id,hsp.item_Name itemName, (select sum(Inp_ops_count) thisYear from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= #{startDate} and t.visit_date < #{endDate} and hospital=hsp.id) countNew, (select sum(Inp_ops_count) from ods.ods_TREAT_EFFECT t force index(TREAT_EFFECT_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= concat(cast(date_format(#{startDate},'%Y') - 1 as CHAR),date_format(#{startDate},'-%m-%d')) and t.visit_date < concat(cast(date_format(#{endDate},'%Y') - 1 as CHAR),date_format(#{endDate},'-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59.0') and hospital=hsp.id) countOld from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where hsp.id in

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from (select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id IN and length(hcb.id)=10) t1 left join (select t.hospital hospital, sum(inp_ops_count)cnt from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.hospital IN and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,t2.dateData dateData,ifnull(t2.cnt,0) count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id IN and length(hcb.id)=10 ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, date_format(t.VISIT_DATE,#{dateFormater}) dateData, SUM(Inp_ops_count) cnt from ods.ods_WORK_LOAD t force index(WORK_LOAD_sumindex) where t.hospital IN AND visit_date >= #{startDate} AND visit_date < #{endDate} group by t.hospital,dateData ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode
